name: Sleep Tight Dear Child
description:
Sleep Tight Dear Child

A spooky Platformer x Tower Defense game by Mirco Kraenz

Created for Godot Wild Jam #52 Dec 2022

Concept, Programming: Mirco Kraenz

Art and Sound:

  • Dawns lighthouse asset pack by FrozenTaurus
  • Floating skulls by Will Tice (license)
  • Portal by actuallykron
  • Brickwalls by SpiderDave
  • Thunderstorm ambient sound by Tomattka
  • Howling wind ambient sound by Fasolt
  • Musicbox by Setuniman under CC BY-NC 4.0.  No changes made.
  • Closing door sound by shinshi under CC BY 4.0. Changes: Cut out first half of the track and added reverb
  • Coins by BizmasterStudios under CC BY 4.0. No changes made.
  • Healthbars by mounirtohani
  • Ingame music "Repentant" by Spring Spring
  • Evil eye creatur by luizmelo
  • Light torch sound by spookymodem under CC BY 3.0. Changes: Only used second sound in track, transformed to mp3.

Kudos to all the artists for the amazing free art and sounds!
